query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative music videos, such as 'Thriller' and 'Beat It', contribute to the evolution of the music industry and popular culture?

query_2.text: In what ways did Whitney Houston's vocal prowess and her iconic rendition of 'I Will Always Love You' influence the music landscape and inspire future artists?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's reinvention of his persona and musical style throughout the decades impact the glam rock movement and shape contemporary music?

query_4.text: In what ways did Freddie Mercury's songwriting and theatrical performances with Queen redefine the boundaries of rock music and live entertainment?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's fusion of pop and R&B, along with her vocal techniques, influenced modern pop music and set trends for a new generation of artists?

query_6.text: In what ways did Bob Marley's music and message of peace and social justice resonate globally, and how did he contribute to the popularization of reggae music?
